title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

node.snippet: <button type="button" value="news" class="btn azure small me-3 button-topic">
node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.35 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #0384a2, font size: 9.0pt (12px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

title: `<frame>` or `<iframe>` elements do not have a title
description: Screen reader users rely on frame titles to describe the contents of frames. [Learn more about frame titles](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/frame-title).

node.snippet: <iframe src="javascript:false" style="width: 0px; height: 0px; border: 0px;">
node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has no title attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

node.snippet: <iframe src="javascript:false" style="width: 0px; height: 0px; border: 0px;">
node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has no title attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

title: Links do not have a discernible name
description: Link text (and alternate text for images, when used as links) that is discernible, unique, and focusable improves the navigation experience for screen reader users. [Learn how to make links accessible](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/link-name).

node.snippet: <a href="https://www.facebook.com/PikesPeakedu" class="facebook">
node.explanation:
Fix all of the following:
  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text

Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute

title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.snippet: <button class="active">
node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (18.7px by 26px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 15.2px instead of at least 24px.

node.snippet: <button>
node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (20.5px by 26px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 15.2px instead of at least 24px.

node.snippet: <button>
node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (20.2px by 26px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 16.8px instead of at least 24px.
